title: Autonomous Underwater Vehicle Networks
summary: Developing advanced communication protocols for underwater autonomous vehicle swarms using acoustic and magnetic induction technologies.

title: Federated Learning for IoT
summary: Implementing decentralized machine learning algorithms for Internet of Things devices while preserving privacy and reducing bandwidth usage.

title: mmWave Network Security
summary: Investigating security vulnerabilities and developing countermeasures for millimeter wave wireless networks in 5G and beyond systems.
